mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.re_comment AS reComment, c.content AS content, c.board_date AS boardDate, c.employee_no AS employeeNo, c.post_id AS postId, e.employee_name AS employeeName, d.department_name AS departmentName FROM board_comment c JOIN employees e ON c.employee_no = e.employee_no JOIN department d ON e.department_no = d.department_no WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.board_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment ( comment_id, content, board_date, employee_no, post_id, re_comment ) VALUES ( board_cmt_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{boardDate}, #{employeeNo}, #{postId}, #{reComment} )
